title: Loot system bug
body: I opened a chest and got Clean Up emote, but what i got in my loot is not the emote but a summoner icon which i have already sold in the past month?

replies.body:
The Clean emote you got was automatically redeemed and added to your list of available emotes, be sure to check those for this one!

That Final Boss Icon was actually one you got back in December from a hextech chest ^_^
Oh thank you I feel a little bit embarassed hehe Thans again :)
